profile:
Reborn Renovations is a multiple award-winning custom home renovation company that provides a full range of interior & exterior home renovation services.
 
Reborn provides the highest level of general contracting and top-quality workmanship for all your Calgary, Okotos, Airdrie, Cochrane, and surrounding area home renovation needs. Sales coordinators, interior designers, and project managers are supplied for every job to ensure timelines are met and your renovation runs as smooth as possible while delivering the look you desire and staying on budget.
 
Our home renovation services include:

- Whole Home Renovations
- Multiroom Renovations
- Custom Home Builds
- Kitchen Renovations
- Basement Developments and Renovations 
- Bathroom Renovations
- Exterior Renovations
- Home Additions
- Home Extensions
- 2nd Floor Additions
- Garage Additions
- New Home Builds
- Infill Builds
- Acreage and Estate Builds

profile:
Created with a passion for the construction industry, we strive to create spaces our clients want to show off. We joined this industry about 20 years ago and have not skipped a beat. When the owners are not busy working on-site or designing spaces, they can be found enjoying family time and some well-deserved rest and relaxation. 

We pride ourselves on our ability to create relationships with our customers, build trust & deliver a quality renovation. At Upright, it is important to us that every customer feels welcome, educated & spoiled. Because who doesn't like to be spoiled?
